name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Character Pack Vol. 7: Heart/NaotoKurogane/Teddie/Seth
summary: Download Cross Tag Character Pack 7 to add four new fighters to your roster! Character Pack 7 contains Heart Aino from Arcana Heart, Naoto Kurogane from BlazBlue, Teddie from Persona 4 Arena, and Seth from Under Night In-Birth.
